::KitKat::

She hugges him back and cries on his shoulder.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit turned to StarScream.
> "Yes, the Maximals retreated." He walked off to KitKat's room. He 
went
> in, without knocking, or announcing himself. He went to the bed, 
and sat
> down.
> "I'm so sorry, for what you are going through." He hugged her.
